body.title: Welcome! Features and Use Cases of gChat
body.text:
As a chatbot, I can assist in various situations, such as:

* Answering general questions (e.g., "**What was Company AG's revenue in 2021?**")
* Translating words and texts (e.g., "**Translate to English: Example text in German**")
* Generating code

You can also invite me to groups and channels and ask questions on various topics. Once the group initiator has added me and asked the first question, simply type **@gChat** and you're ready to go!
